Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings

Class CmdLineArgs

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings.CmdLineArgs
public class CmdLineArgs extends Object
The object that represents the command line arguments of the application.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Optional<ApplicationSettings>
    appSettings
    The application startup settings.
    private final boolean
    showHelp
    Whether to show only the help message, without running the application.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    private
    CmdLineArgs()
    Create an object that indicates to show the app help, but don't run the application itself.

    Create an object with the settings to run the application.

  • Field Details

    • showHelp

      private final boolean showHelp
      Whether to show only the help message, without running the application.

    • appSettings

      private final Optional<ApplicationSettings> appSettings
      The application startup settings. If the isHelp() method return true, this is an empty optional field.

  • Constructor Details

    • CmdLineArgs

      public CmdLineArgs(ApplicationSettings settings)
      Create an object with the settings to run the application.
      Parameters:
      settings - The application startup settings.

    • CmdLineArgs

      private CmdLineArgs()
      Create an object that indicates to show the app help, but don't run the application itself.

  • Method Details

    • getShowHelpSettings

      public static CmdLineArgs getShowHelpSettings()
      Returns:
      An object indicating that the user required to show the help message, without running the application.

    • showHelp

      public boolean showHelp()
      Returns:
      True if the user required to show the help message, without running the application itself.

    • getSettings

      public ApplicationSettings getSettings()
      If the user did not require to show the help message, get the startup settings.
      Returns:
      The application startup settings.
